Posted By: Luke_BPC (10/28/2010 5:19:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I used to have this guy in my mono white double strike deck. Equipped with a [whispersilk cloak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=whispersilk cloak), he can take out 10 life in one swing, while at the same time being shrouded and unblockable (not to mention that any of the other cats being played all of a sudden get a huge boost and double strike as well). Unfortunately, seven mana is he is a little too expensive, and games tended to be over before I could get him into play.
posts.html:
